document_data.name: Lanric
document_data.mainbody:
'''"Lanric"''' was the name given for a [[Harper]] agent active on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|If you know that name, it means we're working for the same people.|Lanric}}
document_data.Activities: Lanric worked to stop the bandits and pirates that plagued the Sword Coast and the [[High Road]] north of [[Neverwinter]] in the late 1470s DR. He was based out of the [[Broken Crown]] inn.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, during Neverwinter's Protector's Jubilee, [[Elminster]] visited the city and bade [[adventurer]]s who sought him out to carry an important coded message to Lanric. It contained new orders and a message from Elminster that Lanric was to relay to other Harpers between Neverwinter and [[Luskan]]. Lanric figured it was safer for the adventurers not to know the details.
